title: Effects of Global Trade in Late Twentieth Cent SAQ

content.question: Answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE way that technological changes facilitated global trade in the second half of the twentieth century. b) Explain ONE way that increased trade in the second half of the twentieth century led to global political change. c) Explain ONE way that increased trade in the second half of the twentieth century led to global cultural change.

frqParts.text: Answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE way that technological changes facilitated global trade in the second half of the twentieth century. b) Explain ONE way that increased trade in the second half of the twentieth century led to global political change. c) Explain ONE way that increased trade in the second half of the twentieth century led to global cultural change.

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
